message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $12,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  It's still a great deal for you, and it's the best I can do at this time.  Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. I've considered my budget and I'm unable to meet you halfway at $11,000. However, I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutual agreement.
